title: Awesome phone for the price range
Best phone under 15K range, Just go for it!!!!
I ordered this phone but received a defective piece. ...
Almost a great product
It worked good for 3 months then microphone problem
Screen burn problem
Best place to buy!
Well but headphone jack is problemtic
Good product but one amazing feature missing
Not bad; satisfactory
review:
I like the phone and its overall experience is good. Just the packing of the
product by amazon was very bad. It didnt even look like it contain a 15k phone
in it.  
The phone is working very well and is as promised. I have used it for a while
now and is working upto the expectation.  
pros: 1. good phone for light used  
2\. Fast  
3\. good display quality  
4\. music play back is also very good.  
5\. good camera quality for the price range.  
  
cons: 1. its battery life sucks  
2\. it is not so gud at gaming  
  
so overall this product is not for heavy user for gaming etc.. it can be used
for regular light use...

It's been 4 months since I have been using this phone, and I will like to say
that it's was a really good experience. While ordering I didn't know how the
phone will turn out to be but it was above my expectations. Amazon delivery
was within a week. It is user friendly and above all value for money.  
Pros: Good quality camera  
Fingerprint sensor is fast and accurate.  
Doesn't get hang.  
Strong battery life, gets full 100% charge in 1 hour.  
  
Cons: Speaker volume is low when u used it for Video call.  
Only gets heated when u keep it for charging. Otherwise No heating problem
found.

I ordered this phone but received a defective piece. Amazon did take the phone
back and refunded the amount paid. I reordered the phone and again got a
defective piece. This time the camera was not working.

Been using it for nearly a year.  
Good points: nice phone, easy to handle, decent battery life when using low
screen brightness, decent photos, standard Android with minimum bloat wares.  
Not so great points:  
Major problem of ghost touches when screen brightness kept high. Starts giving
battery problems also

Bought this product in Jan. It worked good for 3 months then microphone
problem, Over heating problem, No battery backup. If you give your phone for
service they won't return your phone even after a month. Worst phone I ever
used and the worst service by service center people.

Bought this 1 and half year back.. but after sometime the screen burn is
regular and camera lens is also gone.. front camera looks better than back
now.. had a good run..

Awesome mobile....I use it continuously for 5-6 hours..neither heats nor
battery goes down.

Phone is ok but I have found two disqualities i.e. 1) If I talked or surfing
net it's become very hot, even at the time of phone charging. I feel very
afraid.  
2) Headphone jack is very problematic. It's not working.

Well it is late to post since it's been more than a week, the product and
service are extremely awesome. But buying such a costly phone it did not
support screen cast, also Anycast dongle does not work. Rest all is fine.

It is average though! It heats up a lot while playing games. Rear camera is
good and front is quite standard. Look is not so attractive. It's good sides
are Corning's Gorilla Glass protection, turbo charging facility and you can
upgrade to android Naugut as well.

I was big fan of Moto phone, this is my 3rd Motorola phone and it is worse.

It has lot of heating problem and hanging problem while charging and resource
heavy app( camra, video recording, or some game).

Pros:  
Lightweight  
Two Sim slots + expandable memory slot (not hybrid)  
Turbo charging  
Fingerprint sensor  
  
Cons:  
No notification LED  
Build is pretty weak. The back case resembles a paper sheet  
Not water resistant, even though it's predecessors were!
